sentences: Jesse Garba Abaga (born 10 August 1984), known professionally as Jesse Jagz, is a Nigerian rapper, record producer and songwriter.
He signed a record deal with Chocolate City in 2010 and released his debut studio album Jag of All Tradez that same year.
He signed a record deal with Chocolate City in 2010 and released his debut studio album Jag of All Tradez that same year.
He voluntarily exited the Chocolate City deal in 2013 and announced the launch of his independent label, Jagz Nation.
Thy Nation Come in 2013; it included singles such as "Redemption", "Bad Girl", "Sex & Scotch" and "God on the Mic".
Royal Niger Company, was released in 2014.
He returned to Chocolate City in 2015 but left the label again prior to releasing his fourth studio album Odysseus in 2017.
He returned to Chocolate City in 2015 but left the label again prior to releasing his fourth studio album Odysseus in 2017.
In May 2020, he released a 5-track EP titled Garba.

sentences: The album was produced entirely by Jesse Jagz and went platinum in Nigeria two months after its release.

sentences: Oye Akd of 360nobs granted the album an overall verdict of 7.5 stars out of 10, commending it for being a diverse body of work that contained a "mixture of beats and rhymes that exemplify where Nigerian hip-hop should be today".
